tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
quoteText:
You also have the right to ask us to delete your personal data we have collected about you. If you want to see or delete your personal data, contact us. We will not deny you services, charge you different prices, or provide you with a different level of service solely for exercising your privacy rights.

If you request to see or delete your personal data, weâ€™ll first need to verify who you are before we can respond to your request.
